content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Good day, thank you for considering my apartment for rental. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my returns on investment, so I am hopeful we can come to an agreement on a fair price. What are your thoughts on the rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I appreciate your time and the opportunity to see the apartment. Based on my understanding of the market and the size of your apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 550 Euro per month. Is this a reasonable offer for you?
name: Max Müller

content: Thank you for your proposal, Max. I appreciate your consideration of the market and the apartment's size. While I understand where you are coming from, I believe a rental price of 550 Euro per month is not competitive in this area. I would like to counter with a rental price of 650 Euro per month. Is this a more reasonable offer for you?
name: Max Müller

content: Mister Heine, I understand your concern for maximizing your gains, but I believe a rental price of 650 Euro per month is also not competitive in this area. Based on my research, I believe a rental price of 550 Euro per month is a fair market value for a 25 square meter apartment in this area. Would you be open to considering this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your understanding and willingness to negotiate. While I still believe a rental price of 650 Euro per month is necessary to cover my costs and maximize my returns, I am open to considering your proposal of 550 Euro per month. Is this a final offer for you?
name: Max Müller
